caller_intent: Holly is informing Doris about the cost increase for adding a 2012 Nissan to her insurance policy and advising her not to proceed with the addition until further confirmation.
resolution_steps: Provided the quote details for adding the Nissan to the policy.
Informed Doris of the $343 annual cost increase until April renewal.
Instructed Doris not to add the vehicle to the policy immediately.
Requested Doris to confirm before proceeding.
summary: Holly from Alliance Insurance informed Doris about a $343 annual increase for adding a 2012 Nissan to her policy, advising her to wait for confirmation before proceeding. Doris acknowledged the information and ended the call.
